mapper.select:
select
from users where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and delete_at is null

select
from users where user_uuid = #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_at is null

from users where user_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_at is null

select
from users
delete_at is null
and user_name like CONCAT('%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by create_at asc
order by create_at desc
limit #{start},#{end}

select count(1) from users
delete_at is null
and user_name like CONCAT('%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
